result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on June 27, 2022 at 11:15 am.

02:01 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood        Justin J. Gallagher pro se. DE didnt' complete PFAC. Off record at 2:02 PM. Recalled at 2:22 PM. Appearances as previously stated. DE has now completed PFAC- Court reviews and approves. DE states he no longer has a phone. Court sets STC to check status of atty. Adjourned at 2:24 PM.  Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 11:15 am.
By Justin G - 22R 008476. jaf
Pretrial Assessment Report. SEALED w/ access to attys.  gll
Status conference on June 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant to test clean before release.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to submit to random drug testing and ETG testing at least ONE time per week. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Lucas C.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

01:23 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood  DF ATTY: Stephanie Schmidt for today   DF:  Justin J. Gallagher appeared from jail. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant doesn't qualify for PD- PFAC given. Bond argument; bond ordered. Court sets STC to check status of atty.  Status conference scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
